testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 1. Unauthenticated Access
testcase.name: should reject POST /api/v1/orders without authentication

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 1. Unauthenticated Access
testcase.name: should reject with missing Authorization header

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 1. Unauthenticated Access
testcase.name: should not leak sensitive information in error messages

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 2. JWT Authentication Failures
testcase.name: should reject invalid JWT token format

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 2. JWT Authentication Failures
testcase.name: should reject JWT token with wrong secret

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 2. JWT Authentication Failures
testcase.name: should reject expired JWT token

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 2. JWT Authentication Failures
testcase.name: should reject malformed Authorization header

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 2. JWT Authentication Failures
testcase.name: should reject empty Bearer token

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 3. Rate Limiting Security
testcase.name: should apply rate limiting to API endpoints

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 4. Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS)
testcase.name: should enforce CORS restrictions

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 4. Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS)
testcase.name: should allow configured origin

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 5. Input Validation Security
testcase.name: should reject order with missing required fields

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 5. Input Validation Security
testcase.name: should reject order with invalid quantity

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 5. Input Validation Security
testcase.name: should reject order with invalid product ID

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 5. Input Validation Security
testcase.name: should reject order with non-integer product ID

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 5. Input Validation Security
testcase.name: should reject order exceeding maximum quantity

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 6. Security Headers
testcase.name: should include security headers (Helmet)

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 7. Endpoint Protection Coverage
testcase.name: should protect all sensitive endpoints

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 7. Endpoint Protection Coverage
testcase.name: should protect products endpoint

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 7. Endpoint Protection Coverage
testcase.name: should allow public access to health endpoint

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 7. Endpoint Protection Coverage
testcase.name: should allow public access to auth endpoints

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 8. Token Payload Security
testcase.name: should not include sensitive data in JWT payload

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 9. Error Response Security
testcase.name: should not expose stack traces in production errors

testcase.classname: API Gateway Security Tests › 9. Error Response Security
testcase.name: should provide generic error messages

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 1. Invalid Credentials
testcase.name: should reject access with invalid AWS credentials

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 1. Invalid Credentials
testcase.name: should reject access with missing credentials

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 1. Invalid Credentials
testcase.name: should reject access with expired credentials

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 2. Queue URL Tampering
testcase.name: should reject access to non-existent queue

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 2. Queue URL Tampering
testcase.name: should reject access to queue in different account

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 2. Queue URL Tampering
testcase.name: should reject malformed queue URLs

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 3. Message Injection Attacks
testcase.name: should handle malicious message content safely

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 3. Message Injection Attacks
testcase.name: should reject oversized messages

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 4. Queue Permission Validation
testcase.name: should verify queue exists and is accessible with valid credentials

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 4. Queue Permission Validation
testcase.name: should not allow unauthorized actions

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 5. Rate Limiting and Throttling
testcase.name: should handle burst of messages without data loss

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 6. Dead Letter Queue (DLQ) Security
testcase.name: should verify DLQ configuration for failed messages

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 7. Message Visibility and Deletion Security
testcase.name: should not allow deletion of messages without proper receipt handle

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 7. Message Visibility and Deletion Security
testcase.name: should not allow message tampering via visibility timeout

testcase.classname: SQS Security Tests › 8. Encryption and Data Protection
testcase.name: should verify queue encryption settings
